column4: i have the ISO and i boot to it and when i choose INSTALL UBUNTU it just takes me to a CLI prompt with a $ sign, what do i type
Behfar-> before we get into the install process, you tried the liveCD and familiarized yourself with ubuntu? ie tried the different features?
i have the LIVECD i think... i got the download from the website, and i boot to it and it asks what i want to do and i say INSTALL UBUNTU and it just takes me to a prompt that says ubuntu@ubuntu:~$
Behfar-> can you check which one you downloaded? the first menu kind of give you a clue, look around it?
AMENADO - ubunto 8.04 build 20080423
AMENADO, my choices are "try ubuntu without change on comp, install ubuntu, check cd for defects, test mem, boot from hd"
Behfar-> I would try the try ubuntu..  thats way if you like it, you can proceed with install, and if not,..oh welll..
AMENADO, that doesn't work either though, when i try to launch it just stops
Behfar-> perhaps you can choose check cd rom for defects, maybe your burn was not good enuff..
Behfar-> and if it did tell you it did not check out okay, then reburn it at slowest speed you can, like 1x
AMENADO, cd CD ROM CHECK comes up fine........ when i do TRY OUT UBUNTU it comes up and starts loading.. then it gets to RUNNING LOCAL BOOT SCRIPTS /etc/rc.local and says OK but it just sits there
can anyone assist me?  when i boot off newest build of ubuntu i get to RUNNING LOCAL BOOT SCIPRTS (/etc/rc.local) [OK] and it just hangs there
can anyone assist me?  when i boot off newest build of ubuntu i get to RUNNING LOCAL BOOT SCIPRTS (/etc/rc.local) [OK] and it just hangs there
matt in googling it i think u are right but idk what to do to troubleshoot
matt, its a ATI RADEO XPRESS 1250
Behfar-> that dont look like a liveCD
Behfar-> perhaps redownload the liveCD version..
the cd self check says it is fine
Behfar-> yes, but is it livecd or alternatecd you downloaded?
liveCD
it boots to five choices, 1. try ubuntu, 2, install ubuntu, 3check CD  4 boot to hard drive ...... and some other crap
perhaps your pc is incompatible with livecd, thats why there is the alternatecd so one can use that instead of livecd
